Article Title: NHL match today: Will Frank Nazar play against St. Louis Blues tonight? Latest update on Chicago Blackhawks forward for December 12
Article Text:
Frank Nazar expected to play tonight (Image via: Getty Images)

Is Frank Nazar playing tonight against the St. Louis Blues?



Blackhawks' Frank Nazar Jumped After Crashing The Net To Score

Date:

Time:

The Chicago Blackhawks head into a key matchup against the St. Louis Blues with growing anticipation surrounding one question: Will rising forward Frank Nazar be available for tonight’s clash? The young star has been one of Chicago’s most consistent bright spots this season, bringing speed, creativity, and an energizing presence to a team looking to build momentum in December.As the Blackhawks prepare for this Central Division battle on the road, fans are eager to know whether Nazar will continue his strong run of form. His impact has been evident through his playmaking and two-way reliability, qualities Chicago will desperately need in a tough, high-intensity matchup against St. Louis.It is expected that Frank Nazar will be available for tonight’s game as the Chicago Blackhawks take on the St. Louis Blues. The forward enters Game 28 of the season with 5 goals and 15 assists, showcasing impressive playmaking vision and the ability to change the pace of Chicago’s attack.Nazar’s development has been one of the most encouraging storylines for the Blackhawks this year. His growing confidence with the puck and consistent contributions in the offensive zone make him a key piece in Chicago’s lineup. With his skill set and improving chemistry with teammates, having him in the lineup significantly boosts Chicago’s chances of generating quality scoring opportunities.Tonight’s matchup carries weight, not just for the standings but also for maintaining rhythm during a crucial stretch of the season. Nazar’s presence, especially given his recent form, adds a necessary spark as the Blackhawks aim to challenge a physical and disciplined Blues squad.Friday, December 12, 20258 p.m. ETEnterprise Center, St. Louis, MissouriESPN+This Central Division showdown brings high stakes as both teams look to build momentum heading deeper into December. The Blackhawks will rely on their young core, with Frank Nazar expected to be a vital component in their attack, while the Blues aim to defend home ice and counter Chicago’s speed with physicality.With Nazar trending toward full participation, Chicago enters the matchup with a stronger offensive outlook, one that could help dictate the pace against a tough division rival.Also Read: NHL match today: Will Frank Nazar play against New York Rangers tonight? Article Title: Aryna Sabalenka and Georgios Frangulis vs Coco Gauff and Jalen Sera Combined Net Worth: Tennis stars, money, and more

Tennis fans love to see Aryna Sabalenka with Georgios Frangulis and Coco Gauff with Jalen Sera. These two pairs make headlines for their excellent tennis runs and expanding riches. Sabalenka and Gauff keep winning big matches. Frangulis runs a fast-growing food brand. Sera works in acting and plays tennis for fun. Many fans now ask one thing in 2025; who has the bigger net worth and how do they earn it?Aryna Sabalenka’s net worth is about $18–27 million, based on reports from Forbes and the WTA. She has earned over $32 million in prize money so far, which is confirmed by the official WTA site.Her boyfriend, Georgios Frangulis, is the founder of Oakberry, a global açaí chain with more than 700 stores.His estimated net worth is around $75 million, based on business reports from 2024–2025. Together, they sit near $94–102 million.Coco Gauff holds an estimated $35 million, confirmed by Forbes which listed her among the top-paid women athletes in 2025. She used to be a world No. 1 confirmed by WTA.Coco Gauff made history by winning the 2023 US Open and added the 2025 French Open title.A recent highlight came in October 2025, when Gauff beat Sabalenka in a close match in Beijing, making headlines for their strong rivalry.Sabalenka works with Nike, Wilson, and Whoop, which brings strong yearly income.Even bigger partnerships with Gauff are with Head, Bose, Barilla, and New Balance. Jalen Sera stays active in acting with steady small roles.Also Read: Islam Makhachev Reveals Khabib Nurmagomedov’s Warning About Fighting At The White House UFC Show

Article Title: Giannis Antetokounmpo to Miami Heat? Milwaukee Bucks star's surprising trade wish list puts team in a strong position
Article Text:
Giannis Antetokounmpo to Miami Heat? (Image via NBA)

Reports suggest Miami Heat are emerging as a realistic landing spot for Giannis Antetokounmpo

Growing belief around the NBA suggests the Miami Heat now hold the edge in a potential Giannis Antetokounmpo pursuit

The Miami Heat have surged to the top of Giannis Antetokounmpo's list of potential destinations if he ever asks the Milwaukee Bucks for a trade, according to many league sources. The league's glamorous markets are forming Giannis Antetokounmpo's wish list, with Miami and New York emerging as top choices.Throughout the year, reports have connected him to both the Knicks and the Nets, portraying New York as "Plan A" for a superstar seeking a larger platform and a team willing to mortgage the future for an MVP. Miami is the contender that is just behind New York if it is at the top of the queue. Giannis would "really love" going to the Heat if the New York path is blocked, according to Howard Beck's recent remarks on The Zach Lowe Show, confirming previous reports that Miami is definitely on his short list.Since Milwaukee's heartbreaking first-round playoff loss to the Indiana Pacers last season and the team's rocky start to the 2025–26 season, trade rumors around Giannis have increased. The Bucks' inability to duplicate the supporting cast from their 2021 championship team has fueled ongoing rumors, despite their continued commitment to developing around their hero.According to Sam Amick of The Athletic, NBA executives are beginning to see Miami as the most attractive and practical destination for the two-time MVP.Giannis Antetokounmpo may be open to go to Miami, according to league insiders, if a package containing Tyler Herro, Kel'el Ware, and Jaime Jaquez Jr. is sent out.Amick said:“The Miami Heat, for example, are often handicapped by league insiders as a place that Antetokounmpo might be willing to call his new basketball home. Pat Riley and company could offer the Bucks a yacht full of draft assets, all their best young players and salary filler to make the numbers work.”The Nets have long considered Giannis a priority target should he become available, and the Knicks have previously been identified as a team that has exploratory conversations with the Bucks. New York provides what he has expressed a desire for in previous seasons: a sizable market, a fan base eager for competition, and the asset base necessary to make a blockbuster deal feasible.If talks with New York don't work out, Antetokounmpo might be interested in joining the Miami Heat, according to journalist Howard Beck of The Ringer. During a recent visit on The Zach Lowe Show, Beck revealed:“While writing Giannis's story and talking to people around the league, after New York, I was told Miami is the place Giannis would love to go if it's not New York.”From a basketball standpoint, the fit is clear. With Giannis as the focal point, Miami has a history of constructing stars, a defensive anchor in Bam Adebayo, and the organizational confidence to pursue another championship-level core.There is a growing perception throughout the league that the Heat will aggressively present themselves as the alternative if the Knicks are unable to complete a transaction. Insiders believe that Miami has surpassed the other teams who were previously mentioned as bidders. The 31-year-old Antetokounmpo is in his 13th season with the Bucks and has a 2026–2027 contract with a 2027–2028 player option.Although Giannis hasn't publicly stated that he wants to leave Milwaukee as of yet, the NBA is in agreement that South Beach is presently the favorite to win.Also read: Milwaukee Bucks re-sign Thanasis Antetokounmpo as Giannis Antetokounmpo locks in for 13th season
Article Summary: Miami heat are emerging as a realistic landing spot for giannis antetokounmpo. Nba executives are beginning to see miami as the most attractive and practical destination for the two-time mvp. Giannis would "really love" going to the heat if the new york path is blocked.

Article Title: The Game Awards 2025: New Resident Evil 9 trailer features Leon, action packed gameplay, and lot more
Article Text:
Resident Evil Requiem (Image via Capcom/ RE9 Official website)

The Game Awards 2025: New Resident Evil 9 reveal trailer features Leon



More from the Game Awards 2025



Leon has finally made his appearance in the new Resident Evil 9 trailer, showcased during The Game Awards 2025. After months of anticipation and countless fan theories, the series’s most iconic hero returned in an action-packed trailer. The latest trailer features horror elements with intense combat moments, hinting at a chilling and immersive survival-horror experience for players.When Resident Evil 9 was initially revealed, most of the spotlight was placed on Grace Ashcroft, one of the game’s central characters. This left many longtime fans disappointed since Leon wasn’t shown, while others began speculating that he would eventually appear. Well-known insider Dusk Golem later claimed that Leon would be part of the new installment, and now Capcom has finally confirmed it. During The Game Awards, the studio unveiled an official trailer for Resident Evil Requiem, and Leon is front and center.The trailer also introduces a new stalker-type antagonist named Victor Gideon, who relentlessly hunts Grace Ashcroft. He calls her “special” and the “chosen one,” though his real intentions remain a mystery.In Resident Evil Requiem, Leon S. Kennedy returns to Raccoon City to assist Grace and take on Gideon, and the fresh footage gives players a glimpse of the gameplay as well.The new Leon-focused trailer hints at a more action-driven experience. Alongside his signature kicks and precise gunplay, Leon is shown wielding a chainsaw against enemies. This moment strongly suggests that players will now be able to turn enemy weapons against them, adding a new layer to combat.Alongside the new Resident Evil 9 trailer, Capcom also unveiled a fresh look at their upcoming title, Pragmata. The game has moved a step closer to launch, with a confirmed release date and a playable demo now available. Additionally, Capcom announced for the first time that Pragmata will also be released on the Nintendo Switch 2.Pragmata has long intrigued Capcom fans as a completely new IP shrouded in mystery since its reveal. Set on a lunar research station, the action-adventure game follows Hugh, the main protagonist, as he searches for a way to stop the hostile AI controlling the facility and find his way back to Earth. He’s accompanied by Diana, an android who resembles a young child and often sits on Hugh’s back during combat sequences.
Article Summary: New resident evil 9 trailer features iconic hero leon s. kennedy. The latest trailer also introduces a new stalker-type antagonist named victor gideon. Capcom also unveiled a fresh look at their upcoming title, pragmata. The game has moved a step closer to launch, with a confirmed release date and a playable demo now available.

Article Title: Mikaela Shiffrin and Lindsey Vonn send support to 2x Olympic champion Michelle Gisin’s after her fatal crash
Article Text:
Michelle Gisin (via Getty Images)

Mikaela Shiffrin and Lindsey Vonn react as Michelle Gisin faces serious injuries



American skiing stars Mikaela Shiffrin and Lindsey Vonn have sent strong messages of support to two-time Olympic champion Michelle Gisin after the Swiss skier suffered a terrifying crash in St. Moritz. Gisin was preparing for the upcoming World Cup events when the accident happened during her second downhill training run. The crash quickly drew reactions from athletes around the world.Gisin lost control at over 110 km/h and crashed into the safety fences on Thursday, December 11. She was immediately airlifted to a nearby clinic for emergency evaluation. Doctors later confirmed injuries to her right wrist, left knee, and cervical spine. She has now been taken to the Hirslanden clinic in Zurich for further treatment. The FIS Alpine organization shared the news on Instagram, which led to an outpouring of support online, including messages from Shiffrin and Vonn.The injuries sustained by Michelle Gisin have raised major concerns, but the skiing world has come together to support her. After FIS Alpine posted the update, Lindsey Vonn and Mikaela Shiffrin quickly commented with heartfelt messages.Vonn sent her love and wrote, “Sending lots of love” while Shiffrin added, “thinking of you”.The incident also reminded many fans of Shiffrin’s own frightening crash last year. On November 30, 2024, Shiffrin fell during the giant slalom at the Killington World Cup. She caught an edge and crashed into the safety nets, suffering multiple injuries, including a deep puncture wound in her abdomen. She required surgery and spent nearly two months in rehabilitation.Shiffrin later opened up about the emotional struggle of her recovery. With The Players’ Tribune, she shared her lowest moments. She said, “I can admit that there were some extremely low moments. Times when I started second-guessing myself, or was critical of myself because I felt like I was letting what happened mess with me so much. It was like: Come on, Mikaela, people have had way worse crashes than that, way worse injuries. Those people got through it. What is wrong with you?”Shiffrin has since made a powerful comeback. She recently won her 104th World Cup race on November 30 at the Copper Mountain Giant Slalom.Fans will hope Olympics star Michelle Gisin also has a steady recovery and returns to the skiing circuit.Also Read: “Her support has been insane” - Aleksander Kilde reveals fiancée Mikaela Shiffrin’s inspiring role in his skiing comeback
Article Summary: Mikaela shiffrin and lindsey vonn have sent strong messages of support to two-time olympic champion michelle gisin. Gisin lost control at over 110 km/h and crashed into the safety fences on thursday, december 11. She has now been taken to the hirslanden clinic in zurich for further treatment.

Article Title: NHL match preview: Where to watch St. Louis Blues at Chicago Blackhawks, predictions, updates, and details
Article Text:
The St. Louis Blues travel to face the Chicago Blackhawks in a crucial NHL matchup packed with storylines, recent form comparisons, and playoff-shaping implications. With both teams dealing with inconsistencies this season, tonight’s meeting becomes an important measuring stick. From scoring trends to defensive stats and viewing information, here’s everything fans need to know before puck drop.

Blackhawks vs Blues NHL Best Bets - Scott Rickenbach NHL Picks and Predictions Friday 12/12/25

St. Louis Blues and Chicago Blackhawks game preview update



The St. Louis Blues head into Chicago aiming to bounce back. After a tough stretch that exposed their scoring struggles and defensive lapses. With several close games slipping out of reach. The Blues will look to generate more high-danger chances and tighten their penalty kill if they hope to challenge a surging Chicago squad.Meanwhile, the Chicago Blackhawks enter the contest with renewed momentum. That is following a strong 3-0 shutout win. Their offense, led by emerging young talent. It has shown improved efficiency. Especially in games where they hit the three-goal mark. Chicago’s penalty kill and structured defensive play have also given them confidence heading into this home matchup.The St. Louis Blues have hovered around low offensive production, ranking near the bottom of the league in goals scored. When they manage more than two goals in a game, they are far more competitive, but inconsistency remains their biggest concern. Their power-play struggles could be a major factor tonight, especially against Chicago’s strong penalty kill.Fans can stream the game live on ESPN+, with puck drop scheduled for 8 p.m.ET from the United Center in Chicago.The Chicago Blackhawks, despite some uneven stretches, have been more effective in turning scoring chances into wins. When they score at least three goals, they’ve collected the bulk of their points this season. Their power-play unit has also delivered timely contributions, helping them overcome tight defensive battles.Expect a competitive, tight-scoring encounter. The Chicago Blackhawks hold a narrow edge due to recent form and stronger defensive numbers, but the St. Louis Blues are capable of pushing this into a one-goal game. A 3–2 Chicago win appears likely.Also Read: NHL Update: Alex Ovechkin goes viral for heartwarming interaction during Washington Capitals community game
Article Summary: The st. louis blues travel to face the chicago blackhawks in a crucial nhl matchup. The game is packed with storylines, recent form comparisons, and playoff-shaping implications. From scoring trends to defensive stats and viewing information, here’s everything fans need to know before puck drop.

Article Title: WWE Saturday Night's Main Event: John Cena's final match, full match card, preview, date, start timings for all regions, how to watch, and more details
Article Text:
John Cena (Image Source: Getty)

Start times, how to watch, and global viewing information

What to expect from John Cena vs GUNTHER and other key storylines

WWE includes John Cena's farewell this weekend as we lead into Saturday Night's Main Event on Saturday, December 13, 2025, where Cena will have what WWE is promoting as his final in-ring match. The match with GUNTHER, which emerged from a build with GUNTHER via the booking of the "Last Time Is Now" tournament, is set to be a hard-hitting, technical exhibition aimed at giving Cena a big send-off while also pushing the opponent forward at the same time.The entire event is packed with multibrand showdowns and title ramifications, including Undisputed WWE Champion Cody Rhodes vs. NXT Champion Oba Femi, AJ Styles & Dragon Lee defending the World Tag Team Titles, and Bayley vs. Sol Ruca in a premier women’s division bout. WWE has carded the show as streaming live on Peacock in the US and regional broadcasts outside of the US.Saturday Night’s Main Event is scheduled to begin at 8:00 p.m. ET / 5:00 p.m. PT on December 13 in the U.S., exclusively on Peacock for American audiences. International fans can watch via WWE’s global distribution partners, including Sony Sports Network and SonyLIV in India, as well as WWE’s own channels in select regions.The 8:00 p.m. ET start converts to 1:00 a.m. GMT (UK, Dec. 14), 6:30 a.m. IST (India, Dec. 14), 11:00 a.m. AEST (Australia, Dec. 14), and 10:00 a.m. JST (Japan, Dec. 14). Viewers should check local listings for possible pre show programming or minor scheduling adjustments as WWE often updates timing for kickoff segments.Get ready for an evening with a nostalgic feel with a competitive edge. Cena can say farewell to the company where he spent the majority of his two-decade career, and GUNTHER's character has made it clear that he plans to ruin the moment by putting Cena through a long technical loss instead of the emotional moment we would all like to see. That dynamic creates the environment for either a heroic send-off for Cena, or a conclusive changing of the guard from one of WWE's most successful 21st century stars.In the meantime, on that same card, Cody Rhodes takes on Oba Femi in a hypothetical champion versus champion match-up that could alter the course of two titles as we head into 2026. AJ Styles and Dragon Lee roll on as World Tag Team Champions, Bayley’s match with Sol Ruca highlights WWE Putting Bright New Talent Up Against Established Stars, and why veterans like Kevin Owens have a way of spelling it out on WWE Raw.With Cena’s final bell looming, Saturday Night’s Main Event is positioned to deliver both emotional weight and competitive drama across a packed card.Also Read: WWE pays heartfelt tribute to John Cena ahead of last match at Saturday Night Main Event
Article Summary: Saturday night's main event is scheduled to begin at 8:00 p.m. Et on december 13 in the u.s. exclusively on peacock for american audiences. International fans can watch via wwe’s global distribution partners, including sony sports network and sonyliv in india, as well as wwe's own channels in select regions.

Golden State Warriors vs Minnesota Timberwolves - Game Prediction

The Minnesota Timberwolves are set to be in Golden State Friday night. They travel to San Francisco to take on the Warriors. On Monday, the Wolves fell against the Phoenix Suns. Julius Randle led the team with 21 points and a team-best 8 assists. Anthony Edwards had a team-high 40 points. Edwards also added nine rebounds.On the other hand, the Golden State Warriors are coming back to their arena after a break of four days. They are all set to prepare for the match against the Minnesota Timberwolves at the Chase Centre. Although Stephen Curry was present at the full practice on Wednesday, his coming back from his quadriceps injury still makes him doubtful. The heavyweights have decided to confront each other with great injuries on both sides.On Friday, December 12, at Chase Centre in San Francisco, the Wolves will meet the Warriors. The game is set to start at 9PM EST. NBA TV and FanDuel Sports Network will broadcast the game. Additionally, the Timberwolves app and iHeartRadio's Timberwolves channel will provide the fans with access to the game's radio broadcast. Furthermore, fans can stream the game online on Prime Video.Before the Phoenix Suns ended their five-game winning streak, Minnesota will be trying to get back to winning ways as soon as possible.According to DraftKings, the odds for this match point to a close game that might as well go to the very end.The Wolves have a winning record of 7-5 when playing on the road. They have won 6 out of their last 10 games. Additionally, they are positioned at the 13th spot in the defense ranking with an average of 113.4 defensive rating and the 8th spot in the offense rating with an average of 117.9 offensive rating. On the other hand, the Warriors' attack is significantly influenced by the non-availability of their leading scorer.Although Golden State anticipates a number of reinforcements in the near future, some key players are still doubtful based on the injury report for this game. The Timberwolves, on the other hand, have a more assured roster because they haven't announced any significant confirmed absences.The Wolves have taken advantage of the few days between games following their most recent game on Monday to regroup and tighten things up, something Rudy Gobert thinks will be beneficial.Also read: Jonathan Kuminga moving to Sacramento Kings? Golden State Warriors’ rotation twist puts star's future under trade spotlight

Article Title: Tee Higgins injury update: Insider details troubling news for star WR’s concussion as Bengals rule him out for Week 15
Article Text:
Tee Higgins suffers a tough time.(Image via Getty Images)

NFL insider shares concerning update about Tee Higgins as the Cincinnati Bengals are up for a tough match



Tee Higgins suffered a concussion for the second time amid the Cincinnati Bengals’ tough season



Tee Higgins, the Cincinnati Bengals’ star player, is dealing with a brutal concussion as the team faces a challenging time on the field.At the game against the Buffalo Bills in Week 14, Tee Higgins sustained a concussion which led him to leave the game midway and return a few minutes later after a proper evaluation. As the Cincinnati Bengals gear up to face the Baltimore Ravens on Thursday, popular NFL insider ESPN’s Ben Baby has shared a concerning update about him.A few hours ago, popular NFL insider ESPN’s Ben Baby reported, "Bengals WR Tee Higgins (concussion) not at Friday’s practice. Has been limited this week as he works through concussion protocol…”The popular NFL insider added, "This would track since he left practice early yesterday. Wasn’t sure if he ended up returning…”This was followed by the Cincinnati Bengals’ head coach, Zac Taylor, confirming that Tee Higgins would not be taking the field against the Baltimore Ravens on Sunday.This announcement has sparked panic among fans as this is the second time that the Cincinnati Bengals’ star player, Tee Higgins, has sustained a brutal concussion in the new season.For the unversed, a few weeks ago, the team’s star wide receiver, Tee Higgins, sustained a concussion and had to miss the first round of the match against the Baltimore Ravens, which the Cincinnati Bengals had won.However, Tee Higgins was placed on concussion protocol and he ended up clearing it on 5th December to face the Buffalo Bills last weekend.Unfortunately, as fans watched in horror, Tee Higgins’ head slammed into the ground as he took the field against the Buffalo Bills.The Cincinnati Bengals was immediately taken to the medical tent and went through an evaluation, only to return to the game a few minutes later.But things did not work out well as not only did the Cincinnati Bengals witnessed a brutal loss against the Buffalo Bills but also Tee Higgins was again placed on concussion protocol on Monday after he experienced certain symptoms.As the Cincinnati Bengals take the field on Sunday, fans are hoping for a win this time amid a tough stretch.Also Read: Sherrone Moore and Paige Shiver’s alleged affair takes a new turn after shocking social media post sparks chaos among fans
Article Summary: Nfl insider shares concerning update about tee higgins as the cincinnati bengals are up for a tough match against the baltimore ravens. At the game against the buffalo bills in week 14, tee higgins sustained a concussion which led him to leave the game midway and return a few minutes later after a proper evaluation.

Article Title: Is Joel Embiid playing tonight vs the Indiana Pacers? Latest update on the Philadelphia 76ers star's injury report (December 12, 2025)
Article Text:
Philadelphia 76ers' Joel Embiid runs up the court during the first half of an NBA basketball game against the Atlanta Hawks, Sunday, Nov. 30, 2025, in Philadelphia. (AP Photo/Chris Szagola)

Joel Embiid’s Injury Status vs the Indiana Pacers (December 12, 2025)

Full Philadelphia 76ers Injury Report vs Indiana Pacers (December 12, 2025)

Player Status Injury/Details Joel Embiid



Probable

Tyrese Maxey

Kelly Oubre Jr.

Trendon Watford

Hunter Sallis

Pacers’ Injury Problems Mount

What’s at Stake for Both Teams

The Philadelphia 76ers enter their December 12, 2025 matchup against the Indiana Pacers with renewed optimism as Joel Embiid inches closer to full strength. After an extended absence earlier in the season, the reigning MVP is trending upward, and his return has immediately shifted the tone in Philadelphia. Fans are hoping this is the night where “The Process” fully reasserts himself.This matchup also carries weight for a Sixers team trying to build momentum in a crowded Eastern Conference race. At 13-10, Philadelphia has shown flashes but has struggled to stay healthy. A healthier Embiid, paired with Tyrese Maxey’s probable return, positions the Sixers to capitalize against a severely depleted Pacers squad limping into Wells Fargo Center at 6-18.Joel Embiid is listed as probable due to left knee injury recovery, signaling a positive trend after logging 31 points and 12 rebounds in his return against the Chicago Bulls on December 8. Despite missing 14 games earlier this season for bilateral knee management, he completed 33 minutes in that outing without complications. A five-day rest period since then has helped his conditioning, giving him a chance to play back-to-back games for the first time this year.Beyond Joel Embiid, Philadelphia 76ers' depth continues to be tested. Tyrese Maxey, battling an illness, is also probable. Kelly Oubre Jr. remains sidelined with a left knee sprain, marking his twelfth straight missed game. Trendon Watford is still recovering from a left adductor strain, and Hunter Sallis remains out with a right shoulder sprain. Jared McCain, meanwhile, is available after recovering from thumb surgery.Indiana faces an even more daunting situation. Tyrese Haliburton is out with an Achilles issue, while Obi Toppin, Ben Sheppard, and Aaron Nesmith all remain unavailable due to their respective injuries. Quenton Jackson is questionable, further shrinking Indiana’s rotation as they attempt to compete on the road.Also read: Indiana Pacers vs Philadelphia 76ers regular season game: Full injury report, who's out, and more (December 12, 2025) With Philadelphia coming off a loss to the Lakers, Embiid’s expected availability could spark a needed response. A weakened Pacers frontcourt creates the possibility of a dominant Embiid performance, perhaps even a highlight-reel moment over Myles Turner that would electrify the home crowd. Tip-off arrives with uncertainty surrounding final injury statuses, but the Sixers hold a clear opportunity to seize control and keep climbing the standings.
Article Summary: Joel embiid is listed as probable due to left knee injury recovery. Tyrese maxey, battling an illness, is also probable. Kelly oubre jr. remains sidelined with a left knee sprain, marking his twelfth straight missed game. Trendon watford is still recovering from a left adductor strain, and hunter sallis remains out with a right shoulder sprain.

Article Title: Snoop Dogg’s new 2026 Winter Olympics coaching role triggers nationwide criticism and loud questions for Team USA
Article Text:
Snoop Dogg’s new 2026 Winter Olympics coaching role triggers nationwide criticism and loud questions for Team USA (Image Via Getty)

Snoop Dogg’s honorary coach role draws mixed reactions across the United States

“I’m just here to cheer, uplift, and maybe drop a little wisdom from the sidelines.

Team USA athletes are the real stars.”

“talent, heart, and hustle,”

“strange”

“embarrassing,”

“Are you serious? What is he coaching?”.

“What is he going to teach them? How to smoke weed?”

“His enthusiasm is contagious, and we’re thrilled to welcome him.

There was instant respect and connection when he met Team USA athletes.”

“Milan Cortina Creator Collective.”

Snoop Dogg surprised many fans on Thursday when the United States Olympic & Paralympic Committee announced that he will join Team USA at the Winter Olympics in Milan-Cortina. The Games begin on February 6, 2026, and the rapper will serve as the team’s first-ever honorary coach. The news spread quickly and sparked loud reactions online.Snoop Dogg, who became a fan favorite during the 2024 Paris Olympics, said he wants to cheer, motivate, and support the athletes, not run training sessions. Still, many fans questioned the move, asking why a celebrity should be given any coaching title at an event meant for athletes and experts.Snoop Dogg said on Thursday,He also shared that the team stands forand he hopes to add energy to their journey. But once the announcement was posted, many sports fans reacted in shock.Some fans called the decisionandwith one writing online,Another joked,A few fans also worried that this move could distract from training and take attention away from the athletes.Other people supported the choice, saying it brings fun to the Games and helps the Olympics reach new viewers. These fans said Snoop Dogg brings excitement and can make more young people follow Team USA.The USOPC explained that Snoop Dogg will not have a real coaching job. Instead, he was invited to help raise awareness for the Team USA Fund, which supports coaches, staff, medical teams, and athletes.USOPC CEO Sarah Hirshland said,Snoop Dogg will not be the only new face in Milan. NBC also announced last week that Kylie Kelce, wife of former NFL player Jason Kelce, will join the network as part of itsShe will create behind-the-scenes content for fans watching at home. NBC will also feature YouTube and TikTok creators, including Bowen Yang, Matt Rogers, Rylee Arnold, and more, as they bring added stories from the slopes and ice.Also Read: Transgender Volleyball Player Blaire Fleming Says She Feels No Guilt After Teammate’s Eating Disorder Lawsuit
Article Summary: Snoop dogg’s new 2026 winter olympics coaching role triggers nationwide criticism and loud questions for team usa. The news spread quickly and sparked loud reactions online. Some fans questioned the move, asking why a celebrity should be given any coaching title at an event meant for athletes.

Article Title: NHL Trade Buzz: Edmonton Oilers acquire Tristan Jarry in major swap with Pittsburgh Penguins
Article Text:
Tristan Jarry (Image Via Twitter)

How Tristan Jarry, Spencer Stastney, and Sam Poulin impact the Oilers-Penguins trade and roster depth

The NHL trades are getting hotter, now even more so with the Edmonton Oilers and Pittsburgh Penguins changing their lineups through a big goaltending switch. The whole ice hockey universe is really talking about and speculating about the futures of the two teams; in fact, some of the best players and draft picks are even taking part. Goaltender, roster strength, and playoff chances are the factors that determine if Edmonton will have solid goaltending or if Pittsburgh will reshape its tactics.The Oilers reportedly exchanged goaltender Stuart Skinner, defenseman Brett Kulak, and their second-round pick in 2029 for goaltender Tristan Jarry and forward Sam Poulin, as per Sportsnet's Elliotte Friedman and AP News. Moreover, the Oilers also obtained defender Spencer Stastney from the Predators in exchange for a third-round pick in 2027. Jarry, a two-time All-Star, has recorded 9 wins, 3 losses, and 1 shoot-out loss, with a 2.66 GAA and a .909 SV percentage this season, whereas Skinner has had a hard time with an .891 SV percentage in 23 games. Kulak was a key player in the defense of Edmonton, while Poulin was almost the entire season in the AHL, but as a former first-round pick is definitely a player to be noticed. The trades show how serious Edmonton's situation with the goalies was and how Pittsburgh is interested in young players and draft picks more than ever.Jarry’s impressive comeback this season with Pittsburgh’s Dan Muse as his coach gives Edmonton a well-experienced goaltender who can help stabilize their net right away. Even though he has shown some inconsistencies in the postseason in the past, his numbers for the current season (2.66 GAA and .909 save percentage) prove he can take the pressure. Stastney adds depth to the Oilers' blue line after Kulak’s exit, and Poulin offers minor league support for Pittsburgh. The trade not only alters the goaltending situation in favor of Edmonton but also opens up room for the young goalies of Pittsburgh, thus making it evident that both teams are trying to meet short-term needs while planning for the long term.The swap points out the fact that Edmonton is in a hurry to upgrade its goaltending, while Pittsburgh is leaning towards drafts and prospects; both teams, however, are hoping that these changes will have a positive impact on their playoff success and the future of their development.Also Read: NHL Injury Update: Mats Zuccarello and Jake Middleton placed on injured reserve; Aube-Kubel and Matt Kiersted called up by Minnesota Wild
Article Summary: The edmonton oilers and pittsburgh penguins have traded their goalies. Tristan jarry, spencer stastney, and sam poulin were traded for stuart skinner, brett kulak, and their second-round pick in 2029. Jarry has recorded 9 wins, 3 losses, and 1 shoot-out loss, with a 2.66 gaa and a.909 sv percentage this season.

Article Title: Is Ja Morant playing tonight vs the Utah Jazz? Latest update on the Memphis Grizzlies star's injury report (December 12, 2025)
Article Text:
Memphis Grizzlies guard Ja Morant (12) (Image via Imagn)

Ja Morant’s Injury Status vs the Utah Jazz (December 12, 2025)

Statistical Snapshot of Ja Morant’s Season

Memphis Grizzlies Injury Report vs Utah Jazz (December 12, 2025

Player Status Injury Zach Edey



Out



Left ankle stress reaction (min. 4 weeks)



Brandon Clarke



Out



Right knee surgery recovery



John Konchar



Out



Left thumb UCL tear



Ty Jerome



Out



Right calf strain



Scotty Pippen Jr.



Out



Left great toe surgery



Javon Small



Out



Left turf toe



GG Jackson II



Out



G League assignment





Utah’s Situation and Game Stakes

Ja Morant’s potential return has become the dominant focus as the Memphis Grizzlies prepare for a crucial home contest against the Utah Jazz on December 12, 2025. With Memphis fighting to climb out of an early-season hole and the Jazz continuing to struggle, the superstar guard’s status injects rare midseason suspense into a matchup carrying both standings weight and emotional energy at FedExForum.The Memphis Grizzlies have rediscovered their rhythm during Morant’s absence, winning seven of their last ten games while showcasing unexpected depth from rookies and role players. Still, the possibility of the franchise face stepping back onto the court has turned local buzz into full-blown anticipation, especially with the team sitting at 11-13 and eyeing a potential surge.Ja Morant remains officially listed as questionable due to a right calf strain that has kept him out of the past 10 games. He last appeared on November 15 against the Cleveland Cavaliers before the lingering issue shut him down, limiting him to just 12 outings so far. Encouragingly, he completed a full practice without restrictions on Thursday, prompting head coach Tuomas Iisalo to label his progress as promising while emphasizing that the final decision hinges on how Morant’s body responds closer to tip-off.Both the 9:30 AM and 11:30 AM ET league injury reports maintained his questionable designation, with no upgrade issued by late evening IST.Despite the uncertainty, the momentum toward a return has built steady optimism among fans.Before the injury pause, ja Morant averaged 17.9 points, 3.5 rebounds, and 7.6 assists. His efficiency, however, lagged at 35.9 percent from the field and 16.7 percent from three, numbers expected to normalize as he re-establishes rhythm. In his absence, rookies Cam Spencer (11.1 points, 3.9 assists) and Jaylen Wells have taken on larger roles, helping Memphis improve an offense that still ranks just 25th in overall rating.The Memphis Grizzlies continue to battle a lengthy injury list beyond Morant:Jaren Jackson Jr. remains available despite recent scoring struggles.Utah enters the contest undermanned as well, missing Walker Kessler (season-ending left shoulder surgery), Georges Niang (left foot stress reaction), and several players on G League assignments. The Jazz hold an 8-15 record and continue searching for stability.Also read: Is LaMelo Ball playing tonigh vs the Chicago Bulls? Latest update on the Charlotte Hornets star's injury report (December 12, 2025) Tip-off is set for 8 p.m. ET (7:30 a.m. IST) across regional and streaming broadcasts. Should Morant be cleared, the matchup could mark a high-energy return as Memphis balances excitement with caution to avoid any setback during a pivotal stretch of the season.
Article Summary: Memphis grizzlies guard ja morant remains officially listed as questionable due to a right calf strain that has kept him out of the past 10 games. Morant completed a full practice without restrictions on thursday, prompting head coach tuomas iisalo to label his progress as promising.

Article Title: Ex-NFL QB Robert Griffin III claims Chiefs’ biggest problem is “predictability” as Kansas City fights to stay in playoff race
Article Text:
Chiefs’ season on the brink.Image via: Getty

Ex-NFL star Robert Griffin III believes the Chiefs’ offense has become too easy to read

Also read

The Kansas City Chiefs are entering the final stretch of the regular season in a place almost no one expected. At 6-7, they are staring at the possibility of missing the playoffs for the first time in the Patrick Mahomes era. To stay alive, they likely need to win out and hope several teams ahead of them slip. For a franchise used to controlling the AFC, every remaining game now feels like a test of whether they can steady themselves in time.Fans have noticed the same thing analysts have: this Chiefs offense does not look like the group that once scared every defense in the league. Mahomes still gives Kansas City a chance, but the rhythm, big plays and confidence that defined their peak years have been harder to find. With frustration rising, attention has turned to what exactly is going wrong and what can be fixed fast.Former NFL quarterback Robert Griffin III has watched Kansas City closely all season, and when asked what he sees as their biggest issue, he had one word ready. "Predictability," Griffin said while helping USAA gift two military veterans with new vehicles before the Army Navy game. "I’m pretty tapped in with Kansas City, and I think there’s a predictability element right now."Griffin explained that even though Andy Reid and Matt Nagy are known for their creativity, defenses now have an easier time understanding what Kansas City wants to do.Without the constant deep threat that Tyreek Hill once provided, Griffin thinks the offense has lost some of its unpredictability. "The offense really hasn’t been super explosive consistently since Tyreek Hill left, but they’ve been able to dink and dunk, run really good concepts, utilize Rashee Rice, and Travis Kelce, and Xavier Worthy, and Juju Smith-Schuster, and Tyquan Thornton in various ways to make it hard to cover because you have to be prepared for everything," he said. "But you know when Tyquan Thornton comes into the game, it’s going to be this. You know when Xavier Worthy comes into the game, it’s going to be this."Griffin also shared what he thinks Kansas City should try moving forward, and it revolves around giving Mahomes even more control. "This is just a suggestion from a guy who’s played a ton of football, who’s watched a ton of football and has been studying them all year, I think the Kansas City Chiefs need to transition their offense into a two-minute offense," he said. "Allow Patrick Mahomes to do what he does best, run up-tempo, call what he is seeing. "He believes the faster pace would help both Mahomes and the offensive line while tiring out defenses. As he put it, "No team wants to be in a close with the Chiefs with two minutes left in the game."Time is running out for Kansas City. If they want their season to continue past Week 18, they need answers quickly.
Article Summary: Ex-nfl star robert griffin iii believes the chiefs’ offense has become too easy to read. The kansas city chiefs are entering the final stretch of the regular season in a place almost no one expected. With frustration rising, attention has turned to what exactly is going wrong and what can be fixed.

Article Title: Kobe Bryant’s Vanessa Bryant shares an adorable 6-word birthday message for Ciara’s daughter Amora
Article Text:
Vanessa Bryant (Image via Getty)

Vanessa Bryant surprises Ciara’s daughter Amora with an adorable six-word birthday

Vanessa Bryant's Instagram story

Vanessa Bryant shares a heartwarming welcome to Ciara into the 40s club

Vanessa Bryant & Ciara Cuddle Up For Cute Selfie At Super Bowl LVI

The great bond between Kobe Bryant ’s wife, Vanessa Bryant and Ciara Wilson needs no introduction. From posting about each other to celebrating one anothers’ milestone, both Vanessa and Ciara `are a perfect example of sisterhood. Recently, Vanessa Bryant penned a 6-word birthday message for Ciara Wilson’s little daughter Amora Russell Wilson.Even after the Los Angeles Lakers’ icon Kobe Bryant’s passing away, the camaraderie between Russell Wilson ’s wife and Vanessa Bryant still remains the same. The strong friendship between Kobe Bryant and Russell Wilson has beautifully evolved into sisterhood with respect to their better halves.As Ciara and Russell Wilson’s little daughter Amora turns 2, her close friend Vanessa Bryant posted an adorable birthday message. The popular philanthropist took to Instagram and shared a lovely picture with Amora Russell Wilson. The 6-word birthday message mentioned,“Happy birthday, Amora! Love, your Titi V.”Ciara and Russell Wilson posted a series of tributes for their little daughter Amora. The 37-year-old NFL star marked their daughter’s second birthday with multiple memories on Instagram. In a reel set on Stevie Wonder’s A’s the popular singer posted a compilation of clips and snaps dedicated to the little Amora. However, the clip started with Amora walking around as a little baby in a white furry teddy onesie.Kobe Bryant and Ciara Wilson’s great camaraderie is quite popular. Despite being from different sports backgrounds, the late NBA star Kobe Bryant and Russell Wilson were great friends. Vanessa celebrated Ciara Wilson’s 40th birthday on Instagram by giving a grand shoutout to her. She posted,"Welcome to the 40 club! Happy birthday to my fam, my bestie, and supportive sister @ciara!!!! I love you so much!!!! 😘🥰🎉."To which Ciara Wilson responded,"Aaaaahhhh!! I’m in Tha Clurb!!! lol. I’m excited for this!! I love you so much V Boo!"Whether or not Vanessa Bryant and Ciara Wilson have always rooted for one another and even frequently post about their milestone moments.Also Read: Vanessa Bryant turns Disneyland into a family adventure as her daughters steal the spotlight
Article Summary: Vanessa bryant posted a 6-word birthday message for amora russell wilson. Vanessa celebrated ciara wilson’s 40th birthday on instagram by giving a grand shoutout to her. Despite being from different sports backgrounds, the late nba star kobe bryant and russell wilson were great friends.

Article Title: Giants send firm warning to Jaxson Dart after costly out-of-bounds hit vs. patriots
Article Text:
Image via IMAGN

Coach Tim Kelly puts responsibility on Jaxson Dart

Also Read:

Rookie quarterback Jaxson Dart has quickly become the brightest part of an otherwise difficult season for the New York Giants. But after a dangerous sideline collision against the New England Patriots, the message from the coaching staff this week was unmistakable: Dart’s competitiveness cannot come at the cost of his health, or the team’s discipline. Offensive coordinator Tim Kelly did not mince words when reviewing the hit that triggered a brief sideline scuffle in Foxborough. Speaking on December 11, he placed the accountability squarely on Dart’s decision-making.“He’s got to get everything he can and then make sure he’s clearly out of bounds so he’s not exposing himself,” Kelly said. “Our guys went to protect him, which you love to see. Obviously, it hurt the team because of the penalty. Again, it comes down to awareness.”On the second-and-13 play in question, Dart scrambled toward the right sideline after failing to find an open receiver. Patriots linebacker Christian Elliss delivered a powerful hit as Dart approached the boundary, sparking an immediate response from Giants tight end Theo Johnson and several teammates. While some fans called it unnecessary, the league determined the hit was legal - and the onus, Kelly stressed, was on Dart to avoid contact sooner.Dart’s aggressive playing style has energized the Giants but also put him in harm’s way multiple times this season. He previously missed two games due to a concussion suffered on a scramble in Chicago. Yet his athleticism and willingness to extend plays remain central to what makes him a promising long-term starter. Kelly acknowledged that balance is still a work in progress.“With a young quarterback, the ability to be aggressive without being reckless is key,” Kelly said. “He’s got to learn when the journey is over. You’re already on the sideline, the defender has you dead to rights - duck out six inches earlier and we’re not talking about this.”The coordinator also revealed ongoing conversations with Dart about personal safety and situational awareness, insisting the message is “becoming clearer.” Despite the Giants sitting at 2-11 and eliminated from playoff contention, the final four games are viewed as essential developmental reps. Dart leads all rookie quarterbacks with 11 touchdown passes and has shown rare poise for a first-year starter. It's clear that Giants see Dart as its future. The priority now is keeping that future intact.
Article Summary: Jaxson dart's competitiveness cannot come at the cost of his health, or the team's discipline. Offensive coordinator tim kelly did not mince words when reviewing the hit that triggered a brief sideline scuffle in foxborough. Kelly acknowledged that balance is still a work in progress.

Article Title: The rise of ‘Queen’: From ages 8 to 18, how an all-girl team is bringing free chess to rural India
Article Text:
Girls in rural India taught chess for free (Photo Credit: Special arrangements)

Koneru Humpy Exclusive: Why the Chess legend hasn't played since World Cup loss

The beginning of bettering rural India

Free chess reaches rural India (Special arrangements)

But why Chess?

Challenges off the board

Free chess reaches rural India (Special arrangements)

'One girl now playing district-level tournaments'

Poll Do you believe playing chess can enhance cognitive skills in children? Absolutely Somewhat Not really

What is the road ahead for such a bold initiative?

Free chess reaches rural India (Special arrangements)

ALSO READ:

NEW DELHI: The queen was not always the strongest piece in chess. From the inception of "Chaturanga" in India in the 6th century, and through its long journey across the Middle East before reaching Europe in the 15th century, the piece we now call the queen served only as a minister or counsellor.Limited to a single diagonal step, it played a modest role on the board.It took centuries of the game’s evolution before that restrained figure became the commanding piece we know today, one with unmatched mobility and game-changing ability.That journey of the queen is enough to light up the eyes of eight-year-old Aenam, a fourth-standard student at Satpuda Valley Public School in Betul, Madhya Pradesh.For Aenam, who picked up chess only a few months ago, learning the game is not just restricted to moves and openings, but it is now her way of making new friends.“I was very excited to learn chess for the first time,” she said in a chat with TimesofIndia.com. “I enjoy it the most because we get to learn new things and also make new friends. I didn’t know anything about chess before.”Thirteen-year-old Bhanuja, a seventh-standard student from Madhya Pradesh, says chess has taught her how to stay steady under pressure. “I felt excited but a little confused at first," she shared."Yes, sometimes chess is hard and confusing. But it has helped me focus better and stay calm.”For 14-year-old Aditi from Bhadohi, Uttar Pradesh , the benefit of playing chess is noticeable. “I gained confidence in playing chess and started doing it with a clear mind. I have self-confidence because I play chess,” she said.And 18-year-old Shreya, who just cleared her higher-secondary exams topping her class, feels that the game has expanded her attention span.“There are many new things I have learned from chess: how to make decisions in stressful situations, time management, how to be calm, and how to plan ahead,” she revealed. “Sometimes I get stuck in difficult positions, but instead of giving up, I practice more. Slowly, everything becomes clear.”“For me, it has become a new skill. At home, everyone appreciates that I’m learning and encourages me,” she added.For these girls, the world of chess might have remained far away, if not for a new grassroots programme that began earlier this year in July.The initiative, called "Checkmate Betul", was the brainchild of Avika Shukla, a US-based high-school student raised in Gurgaon with family roots in Madhya Pradesh.The idea sparked during one of Avika’s summer visits to India.“I was playing chess with our housekeeper’s kids,” she recalled. “They asked me how I learned, and I said I used to play with my grandparents and later took some classes. Then they asked me, ‘Can you teach us?’”Avika was about to fly back to the United States. “But I realised I could teach them, virtually. With all the technology we have today, a chess lesson is just a click away,” she told this website.That one moment set off a chain reaction.Avika reached out to young female chess players, arbiters, and enthusiasts she knew and admired from across the world.Joining hands with Avika were six young women from across the world: WCM Zara Majid (Cayman Islands), WIM Iris Mou (New York City), FIDE Arbiter Christina Aziz (Gambia), Eesha Gorantla (New Jersey), Claire Cheng (New Jersey), and Audrey Smith (California).Within weeks, a seven-member team formed, united by one conviction: girls in rural areas deserved the same access to chess education that many urban or privileged students enjoy.And that became the foundation: for girls, and led entirely by girls.“Chess offers some of the highest cognitive benefits of any sport,” Avika explained. “It builds discipline like any physical sport, but also critical thinking and educational skills. There are studies showing how chess improves math.”For rural girls, many of whom ask why they should learn chess in the first place, this becomes an important motivational tool.“Our program is tied with schools, so the schools also understand how it is helping the girls,” she said.The team began by tying up with schools in Betul, Madhya Pradesh. They chose rural pockets intentionally, places where structured chess training did not exist at all.“Where we started, there was no such thing as a chess class,” Avika said. “We wanted to bring chess to a group of girls who would never have gotten the chance otherwise.”The team started in Madhya Pradesh but has now expanded to Uttar Pradesh and plans to enter Haryana next. But bringing chess into rural India wasn’t easy.“The biggest challenge was convincing the girls that this is an exciting opportunity,” Avika revealed. “At first, it felt like just another activity. But slowly, when they started enjoying it, it became something they looked forward to.”She remembered Diwali: “We didn’t have class that day. And many girls asked us why class was cancelled. Seeing that enthusiasm was beautiful.”Classes are about 75 minutes.“For 65 minutes we teach chess,” Avika explained. “But for the remaining 10 minutes, we bring in guest speakers or show recorded messages from female players. It inspires the girls and shows them the opportunities available.”The curriculum is taught online, using bold visuals, arrows, patterns and interactive methods that surpass language barriers.“Chess is simple to teach visually,” Avika explained. “And if, for example, Christina from Gambia is teaching, we also try to have a Hindi-speaking mentor in the class to assist if needed."Despite the programme being free for girls, the logistics in rural India are rarely simple.“In the beginning, most girls used their parents’ phones,” Avika added. “Infrastructure is a huge challenge: physical boards, projectors, training material, stable internet.”Their solution came with tuition centres. The team secured sponsorship from ChessKid, which donated full premium access, worth around Rs 2 lakh, to every participating girl, while a collaboration with The Gift of Chess helped them provide physical boards to the girls.“In places like Bhadohi, we now partner with local tuition centres where girls can sit across from each other with real boards,” she remarked. “We teach them online while they get hands-on practice offline.”The programme has already begun to show results.“One girl has improved so much she’s now playing district-level tournaments,” Avika stated proudly. “We just gave her the resources, she discovered a whole new passion.”Another girl has seen a surprising side benefit: “Her English has improved a lot. Her parents told us she went to class to learn chess but ended up improving her language skills too.”The team doesn’t limit enrolment strictly to rural areas, but rural India remains their focus. “If someone from a city wants to join, we never say no,” Avika clarified. “But our mission is to introduce chess to girls who would not have received the chance otherwise.”Looking forward, financial sustainability remains the biggest concern.“Chess can become expensive,” Avika said. “Even top grandmasters say this. If some of these girls become serious players, we don’t want money to hold them back.”They are exploring grants, writing to organisations, and even looking for private donors. But despite the hurdles, Avika’s voice holds excitement more than worry.“The girls motivate us,” she said. “Their excitement, their confidence, their growth. Every time they show up with more enthusiasm than the previous week, it reminds us why we started.”And as the queen once rose from a quiet counsellor to the most powerful piece on the board, these girls, armed with newfound confidence, skills, and mentors across continents, might just be preparing to discover how far they can move.
Article Summary: Girls in rural india taught chess for free. The initiative, called "checkmate betul", was the brainchild of avika shukla, a us-based high-school student raised in gurgaon with family roots in madhya pradesh. Avika, from madhya pradesh, started a team to bring chess to girls in rural india.

Article Title: Clint Frazier warns $8.2B New York Yankees after Edwin Diaz signs with loaded Los Angeles Dodgers
Article Text:
Clint Frazier warns $8.2B New York Yankees after Edwin Diaz signs with loaded Los Angeles Dodgers (Image Via Getty)

Clint Frazier says Yankees of the past now look like today’s Dodgers

“The Yankees of the past are the modern-day Dodgers now.”

“You can’t let certain players go back to a team that is already winning so much. You have to be a speed bump.”

“They have superstar players, but the players around them are not always difference-makers.”

Clint Frazier spoke on Thursday about the New York Yankees after they lost free agent pitcher Edwin Diaz to the Los Angeles Dodgers. Edwin Diaz signed a three-year, $69 million deal with the Dodgers earlier this week in Los Angeles. The New York Yankees, who are valued at $8.2 billion by Forbes, made no strong push for him, and that upset Clint Frazier.The Yankees have 27 World Series titles, but they have not won since 2009. They reached the World Series last year but fell short again against the Los Angeles Dodgers. Clint Frazier said the Yankees are slipping while the Dodgers are rising fast, and he believes the team must act with urgency.Clint Frazier shared his thoughts on Thursday during a radio appearance in New York. He said the New York Yankees used to act like the modern Los Angeles Dodgers, but now the Dodgers play that role better.He pointed at the way the Dodgers spend money and go after top players without fear. Clint Frazier said,He added that the Dodgers are brave with their spending and pick the best players before anyone else.He used Edwin Diaz as an example and said the Yankees should never let a top player go to a team that already has so much success.He also said teams must block the Dodgers from getting stronger, but the Yankees failed to do that. Clint Frazier said,He believes the Dodgers keep stacking wins while the Yankees watch from behind. Clint Frazier also spoke about the roster the Yankees put around their stars.He said the team pays big names well, but the support pieces do not always help them win. He explained that the Yankees have great players but need more impact talent beside them.Clint Frazier said,He believes the Yankees must add players who change games, not just fill space.Clint Frazier also said the Yankees must spend better in the offseason so they do not lose key players to the Los Angeles Dodgers again.He believes the Yankees can challenge any team, but only if they return to bold moves like the old days.Also Read: Kyle Tucker Leaves Big Impression At Blue Jays Tampa PDC As John Schneider Reveals What Stood Out
Article Summary: Clint frazier spoke on thursday about the new york yankees after they lost free agent pitcher edwin diaz to the los angeles dodgers. He said the yankees are slipping while the dodgers are rising fast, and he believes the team must act with urgency. The yankees have 27 world series titles, but they have not won since 2009.

Article Title: NHL match today: Will Connor Bedard play against St. Louis Blues tonight? Latest update on Chicago Blackhawks forward for December 12
Article Text:
Connor Bedard expected to play tonight (Image via: Getty images)

Connor Bedard's Most Unreal Plays Of The 2023-24 NHL Season

Article Title: NHL Hart Trophy Rankings: Nathan MacKinnon dominates as Avalanche star tops MVP contenders
Article Text:
JANUARY 20: Nathan MacKinnon #29 of the Colorado Avalanche celebrates scoring a goal against the Minnesota Wild in the second period at Ball Arena on January 20, 2025 in Denver, Colorado. (Photo by Matthew Stockman/Getty Images)

Nathan MacKinnon holds the Hart Trophy lead while Connor McDavid closes the gap

Panthers vs. Avalanche | NHL Highlights | December 11, 2025

Also Read:

In a season where forwards from every team have given season-worthy performances, and both veterans and rookies alike have been impressive on the ice, the race for the Hart Trophy gets even more intense. But there are some clear standouts even among them.While some have been impressive with their point production, like Macklin Celebrini, others have helped their team maintain a dominant spot atop the points table, as Nathan MacKinnon has done. The Professional Hockey Writers Association met recently to decide which names from November fell off and which remain favorites.While many players have been impressive this season, one of the most impressive is Logan Thompson of the Washington Capitals. With a GAA of 1.96 and a save percentage of .926, the netminder has had one of the best numbers across the league.Only the Minnesota Wild’s Jesper Wallstedt has better numbers among all goalies with more than 10 appearances across the season. But while Wallstedt has been impressive, Thompson has entered the sixth gear over the past few games.Over a span of six starts, Thompson has averaged an SV% of .955 while boasting a GAA of 1.32.With this range of numbers, the PHWA was forced to include him at the No. 5 spot on the Hart Trophy favorites. But while the inclusion of a goalie is rare, the man in the fourth spot isn’t a surprise to anyone.Connor McDavid, despite a slow start to the season by his numbers, has been impressive overall with 48 points in 31 games. Despite the Edmonton Oilers struggling through the Pacific Division, McDavid himself has continued to be terrific.While at one point the franchise looked nearly out of the playoff race, recent efforts from McDavid have pushed them back to the wild-card spot. With a 1.55 PPG, he was ranked fourth on the list of the MVP favorites.But the next two names on the list are the ones who have surprised the hockey faithful the most this season. Connor Bedard from the Chicago Blackhawks and Macklin Celebrini from the San Jose Sharks continue to occupy the third and second spots in the MVP race, respectively.While Bedard was already impressive last season, this season he has kicked his play into overdrive with 42 points across 30 games. Leading the Blackhawks across points, goals (19), and assists (23), he has been responsible for nearly 47 percent of all Chicago goals.Celebrini, meanwhile, has been equally impressive with 44 points (15 goals, 29 assists) across 31 contests. Not to mention, his 29 assists have him tied second for the league lead behind McDavid.But while everyone on the list had been impressive, one player takes the undisputed lead in the rankings. MacKinnon with 53 points (25 goals, 28 assists). The Avalanche Center has been the only player so far who has reached the 50-point mark and has been a big reason behind Colorado’s 22-2-7 record.While his current pace suggests that Colorado might be looking at the first 100-point season from MacKinnon, one thing is clear: Nathan MacKinnon is ready for the Hart Trophy.
Article Summary: The professional hockey writers association met recently to decide which names from november fell off and which remain favorites. Nathan mackinnon has been the only player so far who has reached the 50-point mark and has been a big reason behind colorado’s 22-2-7 record.
